pairing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: two people or things that work together
pairing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The new engine represents an effective pairing of two highly complementary technologies.
pairing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the act of putting two people or things together
pairing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The pairing of the two organizations will accelerate innovation throughout the industries serviced by each organization.
